comments.author: neil@httl.net
comments.creator: neil@httl.net
comments.raw_text: My browser session suddenly ground to a halt. So after a bit, I broke in to the debugger to see what was happening. There were 5 slow script warnings in progress on the stack, presumably all in different contexts. Sadly none of them were visible because there was also a timed GC in progresss.
